alert.note: Alert for Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 4:50PM CDT until May 23 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Traill County in southeastern North Dakota... East central Steele County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 450 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roseville, or 35 miles southwest of Grand Forks, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mayville, Portland, Cummings, Roseville and Hillsboro. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 105 and 114. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
